alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 13 at 4:06PM MST until September 13 at 5:30PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MST/630 PM MDT/ THIS AFTERNOON FOR COCONINO COUNTY... At 406 PM MST /506 PM MDT/, Doppler radar indicated that thunderstorms in the area of Tappan and Cedar washes had dissipated. Earlier heavy rainfall of 1.0 to 2.5 inches across this area continues to drain into these washes. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Navajo Reservation. This includes the following swimming holes... Tappan Spring. This includes the following highways... State Route 64 between mile markers 288 and 295. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Lava Wash, Burro Canyon Wash, Moenkopi Wash, Needmore Wash, Campbell Francis Wash, Tappan Wash and Cedar Wash. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay away or be swept away! The banks of creeks and washes are unstable and unsafe during any flooding event.
